text: Mwesi wa Namasani ni awula wajatulusyidwe Qur’an nkati mwakwe kuŵa chongolo cha ŵandu ni ilosyo ya kuonechela palangulangu ya chongoko, soni kuŵa chilekanganyo (cha yakuona ni yaunami), sano jwauweni mwa jaomanja mwesi (ali chitamile pamusi) ataŵe Namasanijo, nambo jwachaŵe nkulwala kapena paulendo (nigopola), akwanisye chiŵalanjilo ni moŵa gane (ga kuuchisya), Allah jukunsoselaga yakwepepala ŵanganyammwe soni jwangansosela yakunonopa, soni (jukusaka) kuti nkwanisye chiŵalanjilocho ni kunkusyaga Allah (pakutenda Takbirah) ligongo lya kun'jongola kwenu soni kuti m'be ŵakutogolela
